title: Textile, 19th–20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: painted on warp-faced plain weave
description: Two tubular, interlocking fabrics painted with all-over geometric pattern in black on an off-white ground, which, on one side, is interrupted by a rider in a circle.
